name: Colorful Movie Titles Online Quiz | Common Titles | 10 Questions

questions.text: A woman accused of murder decides to take a columnists offer to help.
questions.explanation:
'The Blue Gardenia'.

	This 1953 movie starred Anne Baxter and Richard Conte.

questions.text: A government agent tries to persuade indians to move to a reservation.
questions.explanation:
'White Feather'.

	Robert Wagner and Debra Paget starred in this 1955 western filmed in CinemaScope.

questions.text: An account of a supply unit working behind enemy lines.
questions.explanation:
'Red Ball Express'.

	It was a movie about bringing supplies to General Patton and starred Jeff Chandler.

questions.text: About two sisters after the same man in New Zealand.
questions.explanation:
'Green Dolphin Street'.

	The two sisters in this 1947 movie were played by Lana Turner and Donna Reed.

questions.text: A woman wears the mark of an adultress in Salem.
questions.explanation:
'The Scarlet Letter'.

	This 1926 movie starred Lilian Gish as Hester the woman who had an affair with a minister.

questions.text: Tale of a U.S. air crew shot down during a Tokyo raid.
questions.explanation:
'The Purple Heart'.

	Dana Andrews and Richard Conte starred in this 1944 movie.

questions.text: A small stock holder tries to oust a crooked board of directors.
questions.explanation:
'The Solid Gold Cadillac'.

	This 1956 movie starred Judy Holiday.

questions.text: Nuns start a mission in the Himalayas.
questions.explanation:
'Black Narcissus'.

	This movie was a 1947 British product starring Deborah Kerr.

questions.text: Love is forfeited for success in the court of Charles the second.
questions.explanation:
'Forever Amber'.

	This was a 1947 movie directed by Otto Preminger and starred Linda Darnell and Cornel Wilde.

questions.text: A stuffy professor falls for a cabaret singer.
questions.explanation:
'The Blue Angel'.

	This 1930 German product starred Marlene Dietrich.
